title: Evaluation - MPCA
content:
Can somebody explain this in simple terms, 
Thanks ðŸ™ƒ

comments.body: Thank god escaped the fruit ninja assignments ERA. Did not have these confusing shit , just assignments and projects.

isa1+isa2=20+20=40
assignment (banana+orange)=10 
So 40+10=50 from internals and assignment

esa scaled down to 50

weekly lab submission and Arduino mini project together=20

So total, 50+50+20=120 

This 120 will again be scaled down to 100

I really liked the 5 Isa thing less portions to cover and helped to get over isas fast, why was it removed though? 
Ps-just aformer student now working
Less exams to conduct now, plus parents complained about too many exams it seems
